snippet: The Indian National Congress Party suffered a defeat on Tuesday in a pivotal election in the country’s largest state, Uttar Pradesh.
abstract: Indian National Congress Party suffers a defeat in a pivotal election in the country’s largest state, Uttar Pradesh; loss calls into question the party's political mandate at a time when it is already struggling to advance its agenda in the country's capital.

byline.original: By VIKAS BAJAJ and HARI KUMAR
byline.contributor: Vikas Bajaj reported from Mumbai, and Hari Kumar from New Delhi.

lead_paragraph: The Indian National Congress Party suffered a defeat on Tuesday in a pivotal election in the country’s largest state, Uttar Pradesh.

headline.seo: Congress Party Is Set Back in Uttar Pradesh State Elections
headline.main: Governing Party Is Set Back in Indian State Elections
headline.print_headline: India’s Governing Party Loses Vote in Key State
